data.story: Founder of the App, i am so excited to help everyone find and keep their companions healthy! keep your pets safe and if you need help, we are here for you!
Thank you!! Using this app we were able to recover Dingo so quickly! I love my dog and thank you!
My boy was lost for a few days, i got on the bus and i couldn't reach him so he was left on the street. Using this app i was able to recover my boy  with all his medical records!
We lost track of our dog for a few days, using this app we were able to find him! thank you!

I had to take my dog to a new Vet, and my old vet refused to send me his medical records, thank fully i always kept records on this app so i was able to get my dog the treatment he needs with all his vital information about vaccines and operations previously undertaken
Thank you, i have kept medical records of my dog in this app i am so thankful

We went through a massive car wreck and luckily my dog survived unscaved, i was so glad to know that once he was taken to shelter, the caretakers were able to locate me and give me back my boy as i was recovery in the hospital
Thank you - i really lost my dog for a day and i couldn't find him, thankfully using this app my dog was located and quickly returned
We found a lost dog and used the app to identify the owner, we were able to contact him and return him to the owner!
Thank you, my dog was trapped and thankfully now he is safe thanks to this app!
